job.title: Embedded Software Engineer for Medical Device - C, Startup
job.description: If you are an Embedded Software Engineer for Medical Device with experience, please read on!  Based in Irvine, CA, we are an exciting new startup in the respiratory illness medical device space. We have a team of industry leaders and SME's on our board and it is time to bring on an Embedded Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience and strong programming in C and medical device. This is a very exciting time for us and we look forward to meeting you.  Top Reasons to Work with Us  --actively interviewing!--apply today!!--  What You Will Be Doing What You Need for this Position  5+ years of the experience in the following: What's In It for You So, if you are an Embedded Software Engineer for Medical Device with experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Katy.Bruce@CyberCoders.com Katy Bruce - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
